item.title: Upgrading Capital Markets For Digital Asset Trading
item.description: Preliminary notes: Contact me- https://twitter.com/kanzure Upgrading capital markets for digital asset trading Brian Kelly - Moderator Juthica Chou, LedgerX Bobby Lee, BTCC Michael More, Genesis Barry Silbert, Digital Currency Group Please welcome Brian Kelly, Juthica Chou, Bobby Lee, Michael More, and Barry Silbert. BK: Alright. Welcome everyone to the upgrading capital markets panel. You have the introductions of who these people are. Just one thing before we start, does anyone want to announce they are Satoshi?
